name: DOOR2: KEY
description:
• Why do people solve puzzles?
  • Where is the real intelligence hidden?
  • Who started this tricky game?

    All this you have to find out in an exciting mystical puzzle with doors, where every little thing can be the key to a clue.

    Immerse yourself in a relaxing atmosphere while admiring the surroundings.

    Find a bunch of well-hidden secrets and puzzles to uncover the real truth.
